item.title: Kant Critique of pure reason by Robert Paul wolff
item.description: Start to read the blog of Robert Paul wolff. Start to watch his lectures on Kant. From the wiki page: Kant builds on the work of empiricist philosophers such as John Locke and David Hume, as well as rationalist philosophers such as Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz and Christian Wolff. He expounds new ideas on the nature of space and time, and tries to provide solutions to the skepticism of Hume regarding knowledge of the relation of cause and effect and that of Ren√© Descartes regarding knowledge of the external world.
